topics.body: Out of curiosity, how many people here can drive? I can, and do pretty much every day. To work. Because public transportation is shit in my literal neck of the woods.

"@orcinus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547d2234636872273bac0100#post_547d2234636872273bac0100

A card game where several players are given white cards, and there's a card czar with a black card.

The black card is a scenario and the players use the white cards to see which one fits better.

Some have very "colorful" comments on them
